subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch won the Nationwide race at Charlotte Motor Speedway in Concord, N.C., for his second straight victory in Nascar’s second- tier series.
snippet: Kyle Busch won the Nationwide race at Charlotte Motor Speedway in Concord, N.C., for his second straight victory in Nascar’s second- tier series.
